node.title: England rugby international arrested on suspicion of raping a teenager
node.description: An England rugby international has been arrested on suspicion of raping a teenager in Manchester.
node.content:
["An England rugby international has been arrested on suspicion of raping a teenager in Manchester.", "", "
\nPhoto: All Rights Reserved\n
", "Police officers were called shortly before 11am on Sunday 9 January to reports of a sexual assault.", "A 41-year-old woman has also been arrested \"on suspicion of administering a substance with intent to cause a sexual offence.\"", "Both suspects have been released on bail as \"as enquiries continue\".", "A police spokesperson said: \"Officers were called shortly before 11am on Sunday 9 January 2022 to a report of a sexual assault on a female.", "\"A woman in her late teens was reported to have been sexually assaulted. She is currently being supported by specialist officers.", "\"A man was arrested on suspicion of rape and a 41-year-old woman was arrested on suspicion of administering a substance with intent to cause a sexual offence.", "\"Both have since been released on bail as enquiries continue and a number of lines of enquiry are being followed up by detectives.\"", "-BBC"]
